name: Book Reading
stack: Webpack, React, CSS-in-JS, Axios, React-Router, Redux, React-Media, Formik, Git
descr: Complete (frontend + backend) final project-application as helper to develop useful habits. User can create his own profile with bookshelf and set his goals. Application calculates amount of pages for daily reading to achieve the goal, build a chart and motivate user. This is frontend-part. Browse
note: Role: Contributor. Experience to work with React libraries

name: Phonebook Backend
stack: Node.js, Express, Postman, Joi, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT, Multer, Sendgrid, Gravatar
descr: Backend for user's registration with email, login, adding avatar or picture to profile and manipulation on his contacts (CRUD). Browse

name: Phonebook
descr: An application to manage user's contacts (add, remove, search) after his authorization on backend. Browse

name: TMPL
stack: Webpack, React, Gatsby.js, Google Maps API, i18next, Git
descr: Static website of a modern gym with adaptive design for mobile, tablet and desktop breakpoints. Browse
note: Role: Contributor. Experience with Garsby.js framework based on React library.

name: Filmoteka
stack: HTML5, CSS3/SASS, BEM, Parcel, JavaScript, REST API, Handlebars, Git
descr: An application for searching trend movies and getting movie's details using TMDB's API based on pure Javascript. User can choose the language and sort the movies into a queue-list or a watched-list. Browse
note: Role: Team Lead. The experience of merging contributor's branches, resolving git-conflicts.

name: Ice Cream
descr: A landing page of homemade ice-cream company. There're several basic solutions with JS such as buttons for open or close modals. Browse
note: Role: Contributor. The first experience of team work, work with bundler, creating temporary branches and pull-requests.

name: WebStudio
descr: 2-paged site of web-studio with portfolio. There're applied different CSS-solutions such as work with SVG, forms, animation, positioning. Adaptive and responsive design. Browse
